title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 3, ch. III, subch. B, pt. 410 - Mortgage Bankers: Licensing Requirements; Mortgage Brokers: Registration Requirements; Branch Applications: Notifications: Books And Records; Annual Reports; Surety Bonds; And Consultants Of Licensed Mortgage Bankers And Registered Mortgage Brokers
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 3, ch. III, subch. B, pt. 410 - Mortgage Bankers: Licensing Requirements; Mortgage Brokers: Registration Requirements; Branch Applications: Notifications: Books And Records; Annual Reports; Surety Bonds; And Consultants Of Licensed Mortgage Bankers And Registered Mortgage Brokers

§ 410.3 - Mortgage broker registration; minimum standards

§ 410.19 - Repealed

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 3, ch. III, subch. B, pt. 410

Statutory authority: Banking Law, § 12, art. 12-D
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
